name_original: Savior (itch) (the_mad_coder, The ironic sardonic, Wolf the Lizard King)
description:
A game about Leslie "Bull " Allen, who rescued a dozen wounded men while under heavy fire at the Battle of Mount Tambu.

Made for Extra Credits Game Jam #6.

The theme was "take care", so we made a game about a soldier who took care of his comrades. 

Made using Python and Pygame
